attributes.action: force those who have abused the expenses system to resign.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make all those MPs who have abused the expenses system, either illegally or morally, resign, and not allow them to hold office for at least five years.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
